changeSet.author: Ranga

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name ='NCD Template' AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'All Observation Templates');

changeSet.comment: Adding set member NCD to all observation templates

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'BAMBANANI', 'MAC', 'GWERU', 'NKULUMANE', 'CHITUNGWIZA', 'NAH', 'CHIPINGE', 'MUTARE', 'CONCESSION', 'CHIREDZI', 'TRIANGLE', 'MASVINGO' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NCD Form, Facility");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to NCD Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'BEITBRIDGE', 'BIKITA', 'BINDURA', 'BINGA', 'BUBI', 'BUHERA', 'BULAWAYO', 'BULILIMA', 'CENTENARY', 'CHEGUTU', 'CHIKOMBA', 'CHIMANIMANI', 'CHIPINGE', 'CHIREDZI', 'CHIRUMHANZU', 'CHIVI', 'GOKWE NORTH', 'GOKWE SOUTH', 'GOROMONZI', 'GURUVE', 'GUTU', 'GWANDA', 'GWERU', 'HARARE', 'HURUNGWE', 'HWANGE', 'HWEDZA', 'INSIZA', 'KADOMA', 'KARIBA', 'KWEKWE', 'LUPANE', 'MAKONDE', 'MAKONI', 'MANGWE', 'MARONDERA', 'MASVINGO', 'MATOBO', 'MAZOWE', 'MBERENGWA', 'MBIRE', 'MT.DARWIN', 'MUDZI', 'MUREWA', 'MUTARE', 'MUTASA', 'MUTOKO', 'MWENEZI', 'NKAYI', 'NYANGA', 'OUT', 'RUSHINGA', 'SEKE', 'SHAMVA', 'SHURUGWI', 'TSHOLOTSHO', 'U.B.H.', 'U.M.P', 'UMGUZA', 'UMZINGWANE', 'ZAKA', 'ZVIMBA', 'ZVISHAVANE' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NCD Form, District");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to NCD Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Static','Outreach') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NCD Form, Site Type");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to NCD Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Urban','Rural') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NCD Form, Setting");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to NCD Form Question

changeSet.author: psi

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( "IPV FormB, Facility", "IPV FormB, Site Type", "IPV FormB, District", "IPV FormB, Setting" ) AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "NCD Form, Service Provided");

changeSet.comment: Adding set members to NCD Form
